span.span: Contains the name, instance ID, and condition result of a rule that has been evaluated.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 類別。The following code example shows how to use the class. 這個程式碼範例是 ConsoleTrackingService.cs 檔案中 RuleActionTrackingEventSample SDK 範例的一部分。This code example is part of the RuleActionTrackingEventSample SDK Sample from the ConsoleTrackingService.cs file. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[RuleActionTrackingEvent 範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cea1192f-82e2-4c8a-acc0-5f8ed462de73)。For more information, see [RuleActionTrackingEvent Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cea1192f-82e2-4c8a-acc0-5f8ed462de73).
